tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_engagement_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_engagement_metrics (
  user_id INT,
  post_id INT,
  likes INT,
  shares INT,
  comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE Like (
  like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Post(post_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comment (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Post(post_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title TEXT,
    likes INT DEFAULT 0,
    shares INT DEFAULT 0,
    comments INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE shares (
    share_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    share_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    post_id UUID,
    comment_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
